name: Skaiiryn
description:
Skiiryn is a parody RPG, where the one with the biggest stats win every time!

What to expect

*A lot of dumb humor and bad jokes.

*A little bit of an exaggeration on the actual state of the video game industry

*You can beat all the game in 5 min if you dont fail, so its a funny little experience

*No sound at all, beacuse i spent too much time in other things leaving the sound for the end of the week and then bugs came and unity crashes, so no sound . :C

*It has replayability, all the enemies are generated randomly, not only his stats but also his models and colors
-More than 15 randomly picked enemy names.
-16 different hats and hairs.
-6 Different faces.
-5 Different body types.
-17 Different weapons.
-Almost all of this with random color combination with more than 16 million diferent colors(or i think so... i dont know really. BUT A LOT OF COLORS).
-The boss laughts at you when you fail ! (wait, what thats some weird alexa Cyber Bullying)
And most importantly Youtubers, every boss in this game is someone i like for the game developer community, some of them have different dialog lines and custom body parts, so what are you waiting for, go play it !!

Now some dumb and funny things i think about my game.

¿How i play it ?

-Just tap the attack button once and if you are stronger you smash the enemies, I know an epic combat system like in skyrim.

¿Whats the challenge then?

-Challenge ? you dont need that, we have an ingame store to buy totally useless stuff !

¿Whats the purpose of a ingame shop, and also you spent time coding the store and then didnt have to include audio?

-Thats right, the reason is MONEY (you cant spent real money on the shop, its a fake shop).

¿Where is the lie?

-Play the game and discover it yourself. . . 

I lefton the game a "Cheat" for those that dont want to think and just slay enemies, you just have to fin it.C ;
